scripts.e2e: pnpm exec cypress run --project . --e2e --config baseUrl=http://localhost:2000 --browser chrome
scripts.e2e:development: pnpm exec cypress open --project . --e2e --config baseUrl=http://localhost:2000 --browser electron
scripts.e2e:ci: pnpm exec cypress run --project . --e2e --config baseUrl=http://localhost:2000 --browser chrome
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm exec concurrently "lsof -i:2000 || pnpm --filter host run serve" "pnpm exec wait-on tcp:2000 && pnpm --filter host run e2e:ci"
